location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lieutenant-Colonel Sir Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf to to Captain G Walker, Senior Marine Officer in the Persian Gulf

mods.abstract: Stannus informs Walker that the salute previously fired for the Imam of Muscat [Sa‘īd bin Sultān Āl Sa‘īd], who was shortly expected to enter the Gulf, was altogether inadequate for his rank. He recommends a nineteen gun salute instead.
